T02D2994:55b-0: @55b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2994:56a-1: cad byed du 'jug pa'i sgrub pa las kyi bye
T02D2994:56a-2: brag sna tshogs pa bsgrub par 'dod pa'i sgrub pa
T02D2994:56a-3: po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
T02D2994:56a-4: gnas khang yid dang mthun par rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i lha lnga'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs la /
T02D2994:56a-5: bum pa lnga la rgyud stong phrag re bzlas la /
T02D2994:56a-6: de nas las la sbyar ba ni /
T02D2994:56a-7: rig sngags gcad par 'dod na mtshon rnon po la
T02D2994:56a-8: snying po rgyas pa lan gnyis brjod pas rtsva ku
T02D2994:56a-9: sha bcad do // yang na sa bcad do //
T02D2994:56a-10: des rig sngags bcad par nges so //
T02D2994:56a-11: lan gsum pas rig sngags nyams pa skongs so //
T02D2994:56a-12: mar ngo'i nyi shu gsum la sngags brjod la dkyil
T02D2994:56a-13: 'khor gyi mdun du mchod pa byas na rmi lam
T02D2994:56a-14: du dge ba dang mi dge ba ston par nges
T02D2994:56a-15: so // thal ba 'am chu la lan bzhi bzlas te /
T02D2994:56a-16: dur khrod kyi sol ba las gzugs byas te /
T02D2994:56a-17: mtshon gyis gtub cings la brdabs na gdon las grol bar nges so //
T02D2994:56a-18: yang na dur khrod kyi so la bas lag mthil g-yon du rdo rje bris te /
T02D2994:56a-19: sa la gzugs bris la rdo rje dang ldan pa'i
T02D2994:56a-20: lag pas mnan na gzhan gyi rig sngags non to
T02D2994:56a-21: // skud pa la mdud pa bor la lan nyer gcig brjod pas rig sngags 'ching ngo //
T02D2994:56a-22: dkyil 'khor gyi tsandan dmar pos rdo rje rtse lnga
T02D2994:56a-23: pa bris la gu gul gyis bdugs la me tog
T02D2994:56a-24: gtor zhing gzhan gyi rna bar lan nyer gcig bzlas
T02D2994:56a-25: na ka babs par nges so //
T02D2994:56a-26: chu'am so phag gi dum bu'am thal mo brdabs pa
T02D2994:56a-27: lan bdun bzlas na nad pa la phra men ma'i
T02D2994:56a-29: rma bya'i mdongs dang chu gri dang me long la
T02D2994:56a-30: brgya bzlas ma sprul gyis zin pa las grol lo
T02D2994:56a-34: rma bya'i mkhris pa la stong bzlas te /
T02D2994:56a-35: chu dang sbyar te ltor btang na dug gis zin pa las grol lo //
T02D2994:56a-36: chu bskol ba la lan lnga bzlas te btang na srin bu dang sprang bu'i nad so sa /
T02D2994:56a-37: mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas
T02D2994:56a-38: bud med sbrum ma'i bu skye kha ma la byin
T02D2994:56a-39: na bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2994:56a-40: bdug pa sna tshogs pa la sngags lan nyer gcig
T02D2994:56a-41: brjod nas bdugs na byis pa gdon gyis zin pa
T02D2994:56a-42: las grol lo // sbyin sreg gi thal ba dang
T02D2994:56b-0: thal ba gtsang ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad @56b
T02D2994:56b-1: brjod nas rkun ma byung ba'i phyogs su gtor na
T02D2994:56b-3: gos kyi mtha' mar mdud pa lan bdun bor nas
T02D2994:56b-4: sngags lan bdun brjod pas bdag bsrung bar shes so
T02D2994:56b-5: // spyi gtsug gi skra la mdud pa bor nas lan bdun brjod pas gzhan bsrung ngo //
T02D2994:56b-6: chu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod nas phyogs bzhir
T02D2994:56b-7: gtor bas chu srin gyi 'jigs pa las grol lo
T02D2994:56b-8: // yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas nas gtor na stag gi 'jigs pa las thar ro //
T02D2994:56b-9: phur bu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas zhing dkyil du btab na zhing srung bar byed do//
T02D2994:56b-10: shing sor bcu gnyis pa mer btang la 'bras dang
T02D2994:56b-11: 'o thug dang zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar dang
T02D2994:56b-12: sbyar la blugs gzar du blugs la zhag gsum du
T02D2994:56b-13: sreg blugs stong rtsa brgyad byas na bdag dang gzhan
T02D2994:56b-15: zhag bdun byas na grong khyer tsam zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2994:56b-16: mngar gsum gyi sbyin sreg zhag bdun du byas na char 'bebs so //
T02D2994:56b-17: 'dur ba'i nyag ma la sbrang rtsi zho dang mar
T02D2994:56b-18: gyi nang du bsnyugs pa'i sbyin sreg nyi ma gcig
T02D2994:56b-19: la lan stong rtsa brgyad byas na de ltar zhag
T02D2994:56b-20: bcu'i bar la byas na dus ma yin par 'chi
T02D2994:56b-21: ba rnams zhi'o // rtsva 'dur ba'i sbyin sreg lan 'bum byas na tshe stong phrag lnga thub bo //
T02D2994:56b-22: slong mo'i zas za zhing sngags 'bum phrag gcig bzlas te /
T02D2994:56b-23: zla ba gzas zin pa'i tshe ba nag mo'i 'o
T02D2994:56b-24: ma la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod nas byugs na
T02D2994:56b-26: lo legs pa dang bu tsha 'phel bar 'dod na
T02D2994:56b-27: zho'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas pas 'grub par
T02D2994:56b-28: 'gyur ro // pha rol gyi dpung gi gnod pa nyams par byed na /
T02D2994:56b-29: lcags phye til mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg lan gsum byas te /
T02D2994:56b-30: rgyal mtshan dang dung la brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pas
T02D2994:56b-31: 'phyar zhing bus pas rgyal mtshan mthong zhing dur gi
T02D2994:56b-32: sgra thos pas pha rol gyi dmag dpung gis mi
T02D2994:56b-33: tshugs so // gzhan du longs ma spyad pa'i bum
T02D2994:56b-34: pa 'bru dang sman dang rin po ches bkang la
T02D2994:56b-35: lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas khrus byas na bgegs
T02D2994:56b-36: kyis zin pa las thar ro //
T02D2994:56b-37: byis pa bkrus na gdon gnod do cog gis zin pa las thar bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2994:57a-0: @57a * // rma bya'i mjug ma la lan stong rtsa brgyad brjod na dug go cog zhi ba'o //
T02D2994:57a-1: skud pa la mdud pa bdun bor nas lan brgya
T02D2994:57a-2: rtsa brgyad brjod nas mgul du btags na rims nad
T02D2994:57a-3: bsrung ngo // lam du zhugs pa'i tshe rdo rje
T02D2994:57a-4: can la dmigs te lan gsum brjod nas song na
T02D2994:57a-5: chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
T02D2994:57a-6: gru rgal ba'i tshe chu la lan bdun brjod nas
T02D2994:57a-7: chu'i nang du gtor nas chu rgal na bde bar
T02D2994:57a-9: yungs kar la stong rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bdag gi dmag 'khod pa'i sa la dang /
T02D2994:57a-10: mgol gtor na dmag las rgyal bar nges so //
T02D2994:57a-11: mda' sngon po la stong rtsa brgyad brjod nas pha
T02D2994:57a-12: rol gyi dmag gi khyim du 'phangs na pha rol
T02D2994:57a-13: gyi mtshon gyi nus pa nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D2994:57a-14: yid la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad byas na chom rkun gyi nus pa med pa'o //
T02D2994:57a-15: lcags kyi phur pa lan stong bzlas nas dur khrod du btsugs na /
T02D2994:57a-16: mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi gnod pa dang bral zhing bcing bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2994:57a-17: de nyid phyung na mthong bar nges so //
T02D2994:57a-18: mtshams gcad par 'dod na yungs kar ram dur thal lam chus bya'o //
T02D2994:57a-19: nad pa la gdon dbab pa ni gu gul la lan nyer gcig bzlas te bdug go //
T02D2994:57a-20: char dbab par dka' na mngar gsum khrag dang sbyar
T02D2994:57a-21: ba'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas pas dbab bo
T02D2994:57a-22: // mngar gsum dkar dang bcas pa'i sbyin sreg byas na char pa 'chad do //
T02D2994:57a-23: ser ba bcang par 'dod na yungs kar dang til nag po la bzlas so //
T02D2994:57a-24: sbrin bsdu bar 'dod na srin bal gyi mdud pa la bzlas so //
T02D2994:57a-25: de ltar rig sngags kyi las thams cad byed du
T02D2994:57a-26: 'jug pa'i las kyi bye brag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
T02D2994:57a-27: bkod pa yid bzhin nor bu 'od 'bar ba zhes
